comment: Kvalitní, slad, ovoce. Ale není moje chuť
Not a bad dram but despite abv runs hot. I couldn't even tell it was port finish until I read the details it could have been sherry it's that faint. Definitely wouldn't grab a bottle.

Very smooth Irish whiskey light floral nose with almost no taste and all finish (after taste) of sherry or oak light fruit vanilla rhubarb or strawberry very unique but needs a more flavourful first taste
Hot spicy with wood of a bowling alley
